column1: Ha, took me a little bit to figure out how the time is displayed. Very clever concept and execution.
Just when I thought I'd seen every clock design imaginable... ;-) - nice!
Very, very nice! Awesome! A completely new concept!! Congratulations! It's a very difficult task.
glad you liked it and recognized the fact that the mechanism is unique.. people usually are very indifferent to it!
thanks for liking it.. ya it was a tough one although it looks very simple . almost 2 years from the first brainwave to completion. It got shelved 3 times as i hit dead-ends.
